column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I will say the place is a bit small for the amount of popularity that it carries
column2: so beware there is normally a line depending on what time you visit. It moves pretty quickly
column3: but keep in mind some people are impatient and even staff can get a little snappy. Don't let it deter you from trying some of the best pastries ever! Never let one individual ruin your spirit. Anywho.... with that said
column4: seating can be limited as well
column5: but there is indoor and outdoor along with bar stool seating. Parking can also be a test
